title: No money refund - Unfair Game Balance!
body:
4 weeks ago I bought a Diamond account on ebay for 233$. I thought I can play now with more power, but nothing changed. But it was even worse:

It had no Diamond border, which you can see in the game loading screen, and Im now already back in Bronze 4! My Champions stayed on low damage althought I played in higher Elo!

Thats just trickery! I want my money refunded or my Diamond border and Champion Power!
